title: Art, Race and Transformation, Chloe Valdary
description:
Chloe Valdary uses art and literature to teach empathy, depolarisation and anti-racism. But not anti-racism as practiced by the likes of Ibram Kendi or Robin DiAngelo (White Fragility).

In fact, she believes that Critical Race Theory is a betrayal of the artistic heritage of Black America.

In this conversation with Rebel Wisdom's David Fuller, they cover the legacy of black art, the inheritance of Martin Luther King and much more.

Chloe's work can be found here: https://theoryofenchantment.com/home-1

Chloe's Twitter: https://twitter.com/cvaldary

David's Twitter: https://twitter.com/fullydavid

Rebel Wisdom's Sensemaking course launches again in February, check it out here: https://rebelwisdom.co.uk/courses
